name: Heart Combustion
description:
MADE FOR THE LUDUM DARE 46 CHALLENGE!

Protect the omniscient, omnipotent, benevolent heart.

As RX-72, you must protect your lord from Armageddon in this 3D, FPS, Tower Defense!

TURRETS

Developed with amazing technology in mind, these turrets can be mounted or will subject to using their artificial intelligence allowing the player to do the job for them (whilst earning more money for themselves!).

SHOP

With 3 guns to choose from, and 2 items to use, you are sure to prevent this apocalyptic disaster. Use your money to splash the cash and treat yourself to, let’s say, a rocket launcher!

METEORS

Their only objective, to destroy your lord. Don’t let them do that. Show them you will not go down without a fight.
